metadata.title: Oscar Oceguera - Full Stack JavaScript Developer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Oscar Eduardo Oceguera Bibriesca, a Full Stack JavaScript Developer with 8+ years of experience specializing in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. Software Engineer at Clip, JSConf México Organizer, and EventLoop Mexico Co-Organizer.

hero.name: Oscar Eduardo Oceguera Bibriesca
hero.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer at Clip with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. We should create applications to facilitate people's work and performance.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Full Stack JavaScript Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications that impact thousands of users. As a team builder who enjoys challenges, I believe in the power of collaboration and knowledge sharing to create user-centric solutions that enhance efficiency.
about.paragraph2: Currently working as a Software Engineer at Clip, a leading Mexican fintech platform, I bring perseverance, capability, and innovation to every project. I emphasize attention to detail in UI design and believe in building applications that facilitate people's work and performance.
about.communityValue: JSConf México Organizer (2023-Present) • EventLoop Mexico Co-Organizer • Hackademy Mentor

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.degree: Computer Systems Engineering - Instituto Tecnológico de Culiacán
certList: Local LLMs via Ollama & LM Studio
